column5: This home is great for family and it can also be great for singles who are visiting the city of San Antonio. It has 3 bedrooms, a full bath, a half bath, living room, Full kitchen, Washer and Dryer and many more. Wifi and cable is provided. It is located 17 min from downtown and the riverwalk. Randolph AFB, Ft. Sam are a 6 min drive both direction. Military owner and military friendly. People from all backgrounds are welcomed.
